body:
I would like just to say could we please keep up with 'Slack'!
- All players have slack because Vald has given everyone the name and has added who ever is in if not just tell him on the main post
https://avicus.net/forums/2826cb095
[THERE IS UPDATES AND EVENTS ON SLACK]

If you don't really check slack often then just turn on email notifications and every time you check your emails it will keep you up to date!
{MATCH TONIGHT AT {2pm EST, 7pm GMT}] -(Check slack for more info)
This isnt my job and havent been asked to do this but im doing this just to try get everyone to come on slack!

title: Message: ❀The Liquidators❀

replies.body: Forums is not a place to communicate.  Use Skype or other programs.
